newsitem.title: UK: Cazenove Indian GDR Index barely changed.
newsitem.headline: Cazenove Indian GDR Index barely changed.

text.p: The Cazenove Indian GDR Index eased 0.06 points, or 0.09 percent, to 63.34 on Friday after the Bombay Stock Exchange 30 share index edged down 0.21 points to a provisional 2,880.05.
The premium for GDRs over stocks on the local market was slightly lower at 13.55 percent.
The Cazenove index is a capitalisation weighted basket of Indian global depositary receipts and measures the change from midday on the previous trading day to midday today.
